attributes.action: Provide a Unisex facility for baby changing in establishments.
attributes.additional_details:
My husband was told once that the establishment did not offer baby changing in the male toilets and that myself was the only one that was allowed to change my daughters nappy, as it was in the female toilets.
Baby changing should be accessible to all.
attributes.background: To make it law that baby changing facilities are available for all genders to use, not just available in female toilets.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588060

If you want the Government to require the provision of unisex baby changing facilities we would be able to accept a petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear what establishments you wanted the requirements to apply to.
